footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Dehya | Update Date: 03/04/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Beacon of the Reed Sea__
Her signature
__Akuoumaru__
Her best 4-star option
__Luxurious Sea-Lord__
Free, but Event-locked

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Wolf's Gravestone, Redhorn Stonethresher, The Unforged, Blackcliff Slasher, Prototype Archaic__
The ATK% make them strong in any Dehya team.

__Skyward Pride, Katsuragikiri Nagamasa__
The Energy Recharge gains more value if the number of Pyro units in the team goes down.

__Mailed Flower, Makhaira Aquamarine, Rainslasher__
Stronger where she can Melt or Vaporize her damage.

__Serpent Spine__
Due to Dehya's passive, it's very difficult for her to keep stacks on this weapon. However, it does have a CRIT substat.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value:
<sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> Pyro DMG Bonus|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

If running her as a Solo Pyro, she will need around 300% Energy Recharge. 
Otherwise, she will still require 160%+.

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value:
CRIT DMG|CRIT Rate|Energy Recharge|ATK%|HP%

HP% isn't prioritized much, and only increases in value slightly (still less than ATK%) when you own her Constellation 1.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Leonine Bite
**2)** Elemental Skill: Molten Inferno
**3)** Normal Attack: Sandstorm Assault

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Dispite scaling partially off HP%, Dehya does not benefit as much as you'd think from the stat. Even with constellations, she benefits much more from ATK%. *However, on 4-piece Emblem of Severed Fate, you will see her damage will be similar for an Energy Recharge or HP% sands. *

If you cannot get 2-piece ATK% sets, then you can run her with 2-piece Emblem of Severed Fate instead. 2-piece Elemental Mastery is not recommended, due to her being unable to trigger Elemental Bursts of units such as Yelan or Xingqiu.

Furthermore, sets like Vermillion Hereafter and Tenacity of the Millelith are similar in levels of DPS, but not recommended to farm for her and require setup.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Dehya | Update Date: 03/01/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Greatsword__
Generates Energy for her teamates more than herself.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Forest Regalia__
Craftable, and in a team with a Dendro unit, able to give Elemental Mastery.

Makhaira Aquamarine, Sacrificial Greatsword

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or HP% |<goblet> Pyro DMG Bonus|<circlet> CRIT Rate

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value:
CRIT Rate|ATK%|HP%
*Does not really matter, but you may choose to build her with HP%.*

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Molten Inferno
**N/A** Elemental Burst: Leonine Bite
**N/A** Normal Attack: Sandstorm Assault
Even the Elemental Skill doesn't have to be raised.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: This build really focuses on her off-field Elemental Skill for support. The build loses a lot of merit if you cannot get Tenacity of the Millelith in a 4-piece.
